text: Khilkhil Kazi is a Bangladeshi singer and organizer. She is the eldest daughter of elocutionist Kazi Sabyasachi and granddaughter of Bangladesh National Poet Kazi Nazrul Islam. She was awarded Nazrul Award 2013 by the Nazrul Institute. == References == Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi female singers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Kazi Nazrul Islam Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Khilkhil Kazi
